name: Hamburger Quest
description:
Controls:

A/D: move left and right

W: jump

Mouse: click on objects

There are two endings. See if you can get them both.

There are some bugs:

-objects don't appear in your inventory until you leave the scene.

-if you get stuck on the floor, jump and pray.

Lock sound effect by Dymewiz.

https://freesound.org/people/Dymewiz/sounds/131028/
